mapper.select: select a.no, a.title, a.contents, a.hit, date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') 'regDate', a.g_no 'GNo', a.o_no 'ONo', a.depth, a.user_no 'userNo', b.name from board a join user b on a.user_no = b.no where a.title like '%${query}%' or a.contents like '%${query}%' order by g_no desc, o_no asc limit #{offset}, #{listSize}
select count(*) 'count' from board a join user b on a.user_no = b.no where a.title like '%${query}%' or a.contents like '%${query}%'
select no, title, contents, user_no 'userNo', g_no 'GNo', o_no 'ONo', depth, hit from board where no = #{no}
select no, title, contents, user_no 'userNo', g_no 'GNo', o_no 'ONo', depth, hit from board where no = #{no} and user_no = ${userNo}
mapper.update: update board set o_no = o_no + 1 where g_no = #{gNo} and o_no > #{oNo}

choose.when: insert into board(title, contents, hit, reg_date, g_no, o_no, depth, user_no) values (#{title}, #{contents}, 0, now(), (select ifnull(max(g_no), 0) + 1 from board a), 1, 0, #{userNo})
choose.otherwise: insert into board (title, contents, hit, reg_date, g_no, o_no, depth, user_no) values (#{title}, #{contents}, 0, now(), #{gNo}, #{oNo}, #{depth}, #{userNo})

mapper.update: update board set hit = hit + 1 where no = #{no}
mapper.delete: delete from board where no = #{no} and user_no = #{userNo}
